description:
Jump around, plant carrots, and be on time for harvest, while traveling in vibrant and colorful worlds. Various characters will be there to either help or interfere with your quest.

In Funny Bunny Adventures, players will need to think quickly and logically to solve puzzles. With two different difficulty modes - including Easy, for even the youngest of players - it's always fun and never frustrating.

The game offers a rising challenge and a great variety of levels, upgrades, characters, effects and bonuses.

Features:
•    Helps your children to develop awareness and logical thinking.
•    2 difficulty modes: Easy (for the little ones) and Interesting.
•    Highly dynamic but never frustrating gameplay.
•    3 magic worlds and 35 levels with many characters to encounter.
•    A rising challenge with 26 upgrades and special abilities.
•    Sweet unlockable bonus mini games for even more fun.
name: Funny Bunny Adventures
